chn: 切换多人联机游玩的显示状态
切换多人联机游玩的显示状态

eng:
This character's background
What winding paths brought them here
chn:
这名角色的来历。
过去是以什么身分过活。

eng:
The keepsake held by this character
Each a reflection of its owner
chn:
这名角色持有的遗物。
持有原因可能一言难尽。

eng:
A cumulative figure that represents overall
attribute strength.
You can level up using runes.
chn:
表示整体能力高低的数值。
能使用卢恩升级。

eng:
Total runes in possession.
Upon dying, you will drop any runes in your possession at the site of your death.
chn:
持有的卢恩总数。
死亡时会留在原地。

eng:
Number of runes required to raise a level.
When you level up, you can choose an attribute to increase.
chn:
提升能力值所需的卢恩。
能力值提升，等级也会随之提升。

eng: The number of Great Runes in your possession

chn: 这名角色外表给人的年龄印象。

eng:
Attribute governing HP.
Also affects fire resistance
and immunity.
chn:
决定血量高低的能力值。
也会影响火属性防御力、免疫力。

eng:
Attribute governing stamina.
Also affects robustness.
This attribute also determines how
heavy your equipment can be.
chn:
决定精力高低的能力值。

也会影响健壮度，
以及可承受的装备重量上限。

eng:
Attribute that determines FP.
Also affects focus.
chn:
决定专注值高低的能力值。
也会影响理智度。

eng:
Attribute required to wield heavy armaments.
Also boosts attack power of strength-scaling
armaments and affects your physical defense.
chn:
使用重型武器的必需能力值。

装备拥有力气加成的武器会提升攻击力，
也会影响物理防御力。

eng:
Attribute required to wield advanced armaments.
Also boosts attack power of dexterity-scaling
armaments, reduces casting time of spells,
softens fall damage, and makes it harder to
be knocked off your horse.
chn:
使用精密武器的必需能力值。

装备拥有灵巧加成的武器会提升攻击力，
也会影响落下损伤的减伤率、是否容易摔下马背，
以及魔法、祷告的使用速度。

eng:
Attribute required to perform glintstone
sorceries. Also boosts magic power of
intelligence-scaling sorceries and improves
magic resistance.
chn:
施展魔法的必需能力值。

施展拥有智力加成的魔法会提升威力，
也会影响魔力属性的防御力。

eng:
Attribute required to perform sacred
incantations. Also boosts magic power
of faith-scaling incantations.
chn:
执行祷告的必需能力值。

执行拥有信仰加成的祷告会提升威力。

eng:
Attribute governing discovery.
Also affects holy defense, vitality,
and certain sorceries and incantations.
chn:
影响观察力的能力值，
也会影响圣属性防御力、抗死度。

此外，也和某种魔法、祷告有密切关系。

eng:
Your life. If reduced to nothing, you die.
Replenish it by drinking from the Flask of
Crimson Tears or resting at a site of grace.
chn:
生存的力量，归零时会死亡。

能够使用红露滴圣杯瓶，
或是在赐福休息恢复。

eng:
Energy consumed to use spells and skills.
Replenish it by drinking from the Flask of
Cerulean Tears or resting at a site of grace.
chn:
使用魔法、祷告或战技时所需的力量。

能够使用蓝露滴圣杯瓶，
或是在赐福休息恢复。

eng:
Required for various actions.
Depletes when certain actions are taken,
but recovers automatically.
chn:
进行各种行动时的力量。
执行特定行动时会减少，但会自动恢复。

eng:
Total weight of equipped armaments and
armor. Movement slows as load increases.
The rightmost number is the maximum
weight that can be equipped; exceed it
and movement slows dramatically.
chn:
所装备的武器、防具的总重量。
右侧的数值为可装备的重量上限值。

总重量越接近上限值，动作会越迟钝。
超过上限值，做大幅度的动作会受限（过重）。

eng:
Max weight of equippable
armaments and armor.
Movement slows as load
increases. Exceed this number and
movement slows dramatically.
chn:
可装备的武器、防具的重量上限值。

总重量越接近上限值，动作会越迟钝。
超过上限值，做大幅度的动作会受限（过重）。

eng:
Attack power of the armament
equipped in right hand slot 1
chn: 装备在右手第１空格的武器攻击力。

eng:
Attack power of the armament
equipped in right hand slot 2
chn: 装备在右手第２空格的武器攻击力。

eng:
Attack power of the armament
equipped in right hand slot 3
chn: 装备在右手第３空格的武器攻击力。

eng:
Attack power of the armament
equipped in left hand slot 1
chn: 装备在左手第１空格的武器攻击力。

eng:
Attack power of the armament
equipped in left hand slot 2
chn: 装备在左手第２空格的武器攻击力。

eng:
Attack power of the armament
equipped in left hand slot 3
chn: 装备在左手第３空格的武器攻击力。

eng:
The body's capacity to endure
standard physical damage
chn: 身体受到普通属性物理攻击时的防御力。

eng:
The body's capacity to endure
striking physical damage
chn: 身体受到打击属性物理攻击时的防御力。

eng:
The body's capacity to endure
slashing physical damage
chn: 身体受到斩击属性物理攻击时的防御力。

eng:
The body's capacity to endure
piercing physical damage
chn: 身体受到突刺属性物理攻击时的防御力。

eng:
The body's capacity to endure
magical damage
chn: 身体受到魔力属性攻击时的防御力。

eng:
The body's capacity to endure
fire damage
chn: 身体受到火属性攻击时的防御力。

eng:
The body's capacity to endure
lightning damage
chn: 身体受到雷属性攻击时的防御力。

eng:
The body's capacity to endure
holy damage
chn: 身体受到圣属性攻击时的防御力。

eng:
The body's capacity to resist various
poisons and rot.
Higher values make it more difficult to succumb to these ailments.
chn:
身体对毒性、腐败的抵抗力。
数值越高，越不容易陷入中毒、腐败状态。

eng:
The body's capacity to resist
blood loss and frostbite.
Higher values make it more difficult to succumb to these ailments.
chn:
身体对出血、冻伤的抵抗力。
数值越高，越不容易陷入出血、冻伤状态。

eng:
The body's capacity to resist
sleep and bouts of madness.
Higher values make it more difficult to succumb to these ailments.
chn:
身体对催眠、发狂的抵抗力。
数值越高，越不容易陷入催眠、发狂状态。

eng:
The body's capacity to resist death.
Higher values make it more difficult to be afflicted with instant death.
chn:
身体对死亡的抵抗力。
数值越高，死亡量表累积越慢，
越不容易立刻死亡。

eng:
The number of slots available for
memorizing sorceries and incantations
chn: 能够记忆魔法、祷告的空格数。

eng:
Governs likelihood of finding items
on the corpses of defeated foes
chn: 打倒敌人后，从尸体发现道具的能力。

eng:
The degree to which you can resist
collapsing under enemy attacks
chn: 能够承受攻击，不会失去平衡的程度。

eng:
Your defense power and damage negation
against standard physical attacks. The
former is calculated via attributes, while
the latter is calculated via defensive gear
and any additional effects.
chn:
受到普通属性物理攻击时的防御力及减伤率。

防御力由身体的能力值计算；
减伤率由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Your defense power and damage negation
against striking physical attacks. The
former is calculated via attributes, while
the latter is calculated via defensive gear
and any additional effects.
chn:
受到打击属性物理攻击时的防御力及减伤率。

防御力由身体的能力值计算；
减伤率由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Your defense power and damage negation
against slashing physical attacks. The
former is calculated via attributes, while
the latter is calculated via defensive gear
and any additional effects.
chn:
受到斩击属性物理攻击时的防御力及减伤率。

防御力由身体的能力值计算；
减伤率由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Your defense power and damage negation
against piercing physical attacks. The
former is calculated via attributes, while
the latter is calculated via defensive gear
and any additional effects.
chn:
受到突刺属性物理攻击时的防御力及减伤率。

防御力由身体的能力值计算；
减伤率由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Your defense power and damage negation
against magical attacks. The former is
calculated via attributes, while the latter
is calculated via defensive gear
and any additional effects.
chn:
受到魔力属性攻击时的防御力及减伤率。

防御力由身体的能力值计算；
减伤率由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Your defense power and damage negation
against fire attacks. The former is
calculated via attributes, while the latter
is calculated via defensive gear
and any additional effects.
chn:
受到火属性攻击时的防御力及减伤率。

防御力由身体的能力值计算；
减伤率由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Your defense power and damage negation
against lightning attacks. The former is
calculated via attributes, while the latter
is calculated via defensive gear
and any additional effects.
chn:
受到雷属性攻击时的防御力及减伤率。

防御力由身体的能力值计算；
减伤率由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Your defense power and damage negation
against holy attacks. The former is
calculated via attributes, while the
latter is calculated via defensive gear
and any additional effects.
chn:
受到圣属性攻击时的防御力及减伤率。

防御力由身体的能力值计算；
减伤率由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Your resistance to various poisons and
rot. The higher the number, the
lower your susceptibility. Governed by
your attributes, as well as defensive
gear and any additional effects.
chn:
对毒性、腐败的抵抗力。
数值越高，越不容易陷入中毒、腐败状态。

抵抗力由身体的能力值计算；
防具的抵抗力由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Your resistance to blood loss and
frostbite. The higher the number, the
lower your susceptibility. Governed by
your attributes, as well as defensive
gear and any additional effects.
chn:
对出血、冻伤的抵抗力。
数值越高，越不容易陷入出血、冻伤状态。

抵抗力由身体的能力值计算；
防具的抵抗力由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Your resistance to sleep and bouts of
madness. The higher the number, the
lower your susceptibility. Governed by
your attributes, as well as defensive
gear and any additional effects.
chn:
对催眠、发狂的抵抗力。
数值越高，越不容易陷入催眠、发狂状态。

抵抗力由身体的能力值计算；
防具的抵抗力由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Your resistance to death. The higher the
number, the lower your susceptibility to
instant death. Governed by your attributes,
as well as defensive gear and any additional effects.
chn:
对死亡的抵抗力。数值越高，
死亡量表累积越慢，越不容易立刻死亡。

抵抗力由身体的能力值计算；
防具的抵抗力由所有防具及追加效果总和计算。

eng:
Armament category.
Armaments belonging to the same
category exhibit similar properties.
chn:
武器的类别。
同类别的武器特性会相似。

eng:
The types of physical damage dealt
by this armament. Other than standard
physical damage, striking, slashing,
and piercing damage can also be dealt.
chn:
武器的物理攻击属性。
属性包括普通、打击、斩击与突刺。

eng:
Number of this item currently held.
The rightmost number indicates
the maximum you may hold at one time.
chn:
持有的道具数量。
右侧的数值为能持有的最大数量。

eng:
Number of this item currently
stored in chest. The rightmost number
indicates the maximum you may hold
at one time.
chn:
木箱内的道具数量。
右侧的数值为能收纳的最大数量。

eng:
The names of skills you can use.
Using most skills consumes FP.
chn:
能使用的战技名称。
大部分的战技使用时需消耗专注值。

eng: Container items, essential to crafting, come in various forms, such as cracked pots and perfume bottles. The left number indicates how many containers are currently in use. The right number indicates how many you possess.
chn:
制作道具必需的容器道具类别。
容器道具包含龟裂壶、调香瓶等等。

左侧的数值为容器道具目前的使用数量；
右侧的数值为容器道具的持有数。

eng:
Number of containers remaining
to use in crafting
chn: 可用于制作的容器道具，剩余的数量。

eng:
The degree to which physical damage
is negated while guarding
chn: 防御时，对物理攻击的减伤比率。

eng:
The degree to which magic damage
is negated while guarding
chn: 防御时，对魔力属性攻击的减伤比率。

eng:
The degree to which fire damage
is negated while guarding
chn: 防御时，对火属性攻击的减伤比率。

eng:
The degree to which lightning damage
is negated while guarding
chn: 防御时，对雷属性攻击的减伤比率。

eng:
The degree to which holy damage
is negated while guarding
chn: 防御时，对圣属性攻击的减伤比率。

eng:
The strength of critical hits,
which can be performed on enemies
you have got behind or stance-broken.
chn:
对背向自己或是失去平衡的敌人，
使出致命一击时的攻击力。

eng:
The stability of character's defense.
The higher this value, the smaller
the amount of stamina consumed
when guarding attacks.
chn:
防御的稳定度。

数值越高，防御敌人攻击时，
消耗的精力会越少。
射击时的有效攻击距离。

eng:
The amount of FP required to
perform this skill
chn: 使用战技时必需的专注值。

eng:
The degree to which sorceries
increase in power

The degree to which incantations
increase in power

The number of slots needed to memorize
sorceries and incantations
chn: 记忆魔法、祷告时所需的空格数。

eng:
The amount of FP required to
cast this spell
chn: 使用魔法、祷告时必需的专注值。

eng:
The amount of FP required to
use this item
chn: 使用道具时必需的专注值。

eng: The amount of HP required to use this item
chn: 使用道具时必需的血量。

eng:
The degree to which incoming
standard physical damage is negated
chn: 普通属性物理攻击的减伤比率。

eng:
The degree to which incoming
striking physical damage is negated
chn: 打击属性物理攻击的减伤比率。

eng:
The degree to which incoming
slashing physical damage is negated
chn: 斩击属性物理攻击的减伤比率。

The degree to which incoming
piercing physical damage is negated
chn: 突刺属性物理攻击的减伤比率。

eng:
The degree to which incoming
magic damage is negated
chn: 魔力属性攻击的减伤比率。

eng:
The degree to which incoming
fire damage is negated
chn: 火属性攻击的减伤比率。

eng:
The degree to which incoming
lightning damage is negated
chn: 雷属性攻击的减伤比率。

eng:
The degree to which incoming
holy damage is negated
chn: 圣属性攻击的减伤比率。

eng: The resistance your armor offers to various poisons and rot. Higher values make it more difficult to succumb to these ailments.
chn:
防具对毒性、腐败的抵抗力。
数值越高，越不容易陷入中毒、腐败状态。

eng: The resistance your armor offers to blood loss and frostbite. Higher values make it more difficult to succumb to these ailments.
chn:
防具对出血、冻伤的抵抗力。
数值越高，越不容易陷入出血、冻伤状态。

chn:
防具对催眠、发狂的抵抗力。

chn:
防具对死亡的抵抗力。
数值越高，死亡量表累积越慢，
越不容易立刻死亡。

eng:
The degree to which you can resist
collapsing under enemy attacks
chn: 能够承受攻击，不会失去平衡的程度。

eng:
Strength required to master this armament.
Without sufficient strength, this armament's
damage is greatly reduced.
chn:
活用此武器必需的力气值。
能力值不足，攻击伤害等等效果会大幅下降。

eng:
Dexterity required to master this armament.
Without sufficient dexterity, this
armament's damage is greatly reduced.
chn:
活用此武器必需的灵巧值。
能力值不足，攻击伤害等等效果会大幅下降。

eng:
Intelligence required to master this
armament. Without sufficient intelligence,
this armament's damage is greatly reduced.
chn:
活用此武器必需的智力值。
能力值不足，攻击伤害等等效果会大幅下降。

eng:
Faith required to master this armament.
Without sufficient faith, this armament's
damage is greatly reduced.
chn:
活用此武器必需的信仰值。
能力值不足，攻击伤害等等效果会大幅下降。

eng:
Arcane required to master this armament.
Without sufficient arcane, this armament's
damage is greatly reduced.
chn:
活用此武器必需的感应值。
能力值不足，攻击伤害等等效果会大幅下降。

eng:
Intelligence required to cast this sorcery
or incantation.
Without sufficient intelligence, it cannot
be used.
chn:
使用此魔法、祷告必需的智力值。
能力值不足，则无法使用。

eng:
Faith required to cast this sorcery
or incantation.
Without sufficient faith, it cannot
be used.
chn:
使用此魔法、祷告必需的信仰值。
能力值不足，则无法使用。

Arcane required to cast this sorcery
or incantation.
Without sufficient arcane, it cannot
be used.
chn:
使用此魔法、祷告必需的感应值。
能力值不足，则无法使用。

The degree to which this armament's 
attacks scale with strength

The degree to which this armament's power

The degree to which this armament's

eng:
Type of item.
Shows whether or not
it will be consumed with use.
chn:
道具的使用类型。
使用后是否会消失。

eng: Skill granted by these Ashes of War
Armament types that these Ashes of War can alter
chn: 此战灰能赋予战技、属性的武器类别。

Affinity that these Ashes of War can grant.
This can be expanded with whetblades.
chn:
此战灰能赋予的属性。
获得砥石刀之后能增加。

Number of runes required to upgrade

from remembrances

eng: Number of runes gained when sold

Usable on swords, axes, and
hammers (small armaments and
thrusting swords excepted)
chn:
能在剑、斧、槌类武器使用
（不含小型武器、刺剑类武器）

eng: Usable on medium and large armaments capable of thrusting
chn:
能在中型、大型的
可突刺的武器使用

chn:
能在剑、斧类武器
以及长柄武器使用
（不含特大型武器）

Usable on swords, axes, and
hammers (small and medium
swords excepted)

能在剑、斧、槌类武器使用

chn:
能在可突刺的武器使用
（不含特大型武器）

eng:
Usable on axes and hammers,
as well as curved swords,
greatswords, and reapers
(colossal weapons excepted)
chn:
能在斧、槌、曲剑、
大剑、镰刀类武器使用
（不含特大型武器）

chn:
能在可斩击的
剑类武器、长柄武器使用
（不含特大型武器）

Usable on large and colossal
axes and hammers

斧、槌类武器使用

chn:
能在大型、特大型的可突刺的武器
以及矛、双头剑类武器使用

eng: Usable on small and medium swords (twinblades excepted)
chn:
能在小型、中型的剑类武器使用
（不含双头剑类武器）

eng: Usable on small and medium swords, axes, and hammers, as well as polearms and staves (great spears excepted)
chn:
能在小型、中型的
剑、斧、槌类武器
以及长柄武器、手杖类武器使用
（不含大矛类武器）

eng: Usable on polearms capable of thrusting, heavy thrusting swords, and twinblades
chn:

以及重刺剑、双头剑类武器使用

eng: Usable on swords capable of slashing, axes, hammers, and polearms (small and colossal weapons excepted)

以及斧、槌类武器、长柄武器使用
（不含小型、特大型武器）

eng: Usable on swords, axes, and polearms capable of slashing (colossal weapons and great spears excepted)
chn:
能在可斩击的剑、斧类武器、
长柄武器使用
（不含特大型武器、大矛类武器）

eng: Usable on polearms capable of thrusting and twinblades
chn:
能在可突刺的长柄武器
以及双头剑类武器使用
能在拳头、钩爪类武器使用

eng:
Usable on melee armaments
(small armaments and whips excepted)
chn:
能在近战武器使用
（不含小型武器、软鞭类武器）

eng: Usable on swords (colossal weapons and twinblades excepted)
chn:
能在剑类武器使用
（不含特大型武器、双头剑类武器）

eng: Usable on swords, axes, and hammers
chn: 能在剑、斧、槌类武器使用

（不含特大型武器）

Usable on swords and axes

Usable on small melee armaments
and curved swords

能在小型的近战武器
以及曲剑类武器使用

eng: Usable on small and medium shields
chn: 能在小盾、中盾类武器使用
能在盾、火把类武器使用

chn: 能在小弓、长弓类武器使用

Usable on greataxes, warhammers,
and colossal weapons

能在大斧、大槌类武器
以及特大型武器使用

Usable on small and medium
straight swords and thrusting
swords

直剑、刺剑类武器使用

Usable on large and colossal
swords, axes, and hammers

Usable on melee armaments

and whips excepted)

(colossal weapons excepted)

大剑类武器使用

Usable on melee armaments

eng: Adjust brightness until the image on the right is barely visible
chn: 请调整至能稍微看见右边图片的亮度

eng: Adjust TV brightness to the highest setting
chn: 请将电视调整至最大亮度
请调整至偏好的鲜艳度
其他玩家名称显示配置
必须在返回标题画面后才会套用
配置多人联机游玩的暗号

eng:
If you set a multiplayer password, you'll only be matched with other players using the same password for most multiplayer features.

However, multiplayer passwords do not apply to invasion or support multiplayer.
chn:
在配置多人联机游玩的暗号之后，
会和配置同一组暗号的玩家进行联机配对。

在入侵、猎人多人联机游玩中，不适用此暗号功能。

eng:
If you set a group password, you'll be more likely to see messages, summon signs, bloodstains, phantoms, and so on from others using the same password.

Elements given this special priority will appear differently from others.
chn:
在配置群组暗号之后，
会优先显示使用同一组暗号玩家的下列状态：
讯息、召唤记号、血迹、幻影等等。

优先显示的状态，外表会和其他状态不同。

eng:
With a Furlcalling Finger Remedy, you can see summon signs, which can be used to summon players from other worlds.
(Finger Remedies are consumed with use.)

There are various types of summon signs.
Gold signs summon Furled Finger cooperators.
Red signs summon duelist adversaries.
(For either type of multiplayer, the summoning player becomes Host of Fingers.)
chn:
消耗唤勾指药能看见召唤记号，
借此召唤其他世界的玩家。
（指药为消耗道具。）

召唤记号有下列种类：
金色记号能召唤协助者“勾指”；
红色记号能召唤敌对者“斗士”。

多人联机游玩时，您将成为“勾指主人”。

eng:
With a Furlcalling Finger Remedy, you can see summon signs, which can be used to summon players from other worlds.
(Finger Remedies are consumed with use.)

There are various types of summon signs.
Gold signs summon Furled Finger cooperators.
Red signs summon duelist adversaries.
(For either type of multiplayer, the summoning player becomes Host of Fingers.)
chn:
消耗唤勾指药能看见召唤记号，
借此召唤其他世界的玩家。
（指药为消耗道具。）

召唤记号有下列种类：
金色记号能召唤协助者“勾指”；
红色记号能召唤敌对者“斗士”。

多人联机游玩时，您将成为“勾指主人”。

eng:
You can leave a gold summon sign to play cooperative multiplayer.

This sign will appear in other players' worlds and allow them to summon you as a Furled Finger for cooperative multiplayer.
Multiplayer begins once you are summoned.
(Your objective will be to defeat the area boss.)

If you leave a second summon sign, the older sign will vanish.
chn:
能写下协力多人联机游玩用的召唤记号。

写下的记号会传布到其他世界，
其他世界的玩家能借此召唤您。

受到召唤后，将作为协助者（勾指）
前往其他世界，开始协力多人联机游玩。
（目标是打败区域头目。）

再次使用，旧有的记号会消失。

eng:
You can leave a gold summon sign to play cooperative multiplayer.

This sign will appear in other players' worlds and allow them to summon you as a Furled Finger for cooperative multiplayer.
Multiplayer begins once you are summoned.
(Your objective will be to defeat the area boss.)

If you leave a second summon sign, the older sign will vanish.
chn:
能写下协力多人联机游玩用的召唤记号。

写下的记号会传布到其他世界，
其他世界的玩家能借此召唤您。

受到召唤后，将作为协助者（勾指）
前往其他世界，开始协力多人联机游玩。
（目标是打败区域头目。）

再次使用，旧有的记号会消失。

eng:
You can leave a red summon sign to play competitive multiplayer.

This sign will appear in other players' worlds and allow them to summon you as a duelist adversary for competitive multiplayer.
Multiplayer begins once you are summoned.
(Your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers.)

If you leave a second summon sign, the older sign will vanish.
chn:
能写下敌对多人联机游玩用的召唤记号。

写下的记号会传布到其他世界，
其他世界的玩家能借此召唤您。

受到召唤后，将作为敌对者（斗士）
前往其他世界，开始敌对多人联机游玩。
（目标是打败“勾指主人”。）

再次使用，旧有的记号会消失。

eng:
You can leave a red summon sign to play competitive multiplayer.

This sign will appear in other players' worlds and allow them to summon you as a duelist adversary for competitive multiplayer.
Multiplayer begins once you are summoned.
(Your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers.)

If you leave a second summon sign, the older sign will vanish.
chn:
能写下敌对多人联机游玩用的召唤记号。

写下的记号会传布到其他世界，
其他世界的玩家能借此召唤您。

受到召唤后，将作为敌对者（斗士）
前往其他世界，开始敌对多人联机游玩。
（目标是打败“勾指主人”。）

再次使用，旧有的记号会消失。

eng:
Attempt to invade another player's world as a Bloody Finger.

If you successfully invade, invasion multiplayer will begin. (Your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers.)

You can attempt another invasion of the same world by using a Phantom Finger item. (These items are consumed upon use.)
chn:
能作为“血指”入侵其他玩家的世界。

入侵成功后，将前往其他世界，
开始入侵多人联机游玩。
（目标是打败“勾指主人”。）

在入侵多人联机游玩，能消耗指幻影类道具，
再次入侵曾经入侵过的世界。
（指幻影类道具为消耗道具。）

eng:
Choose a summoned player to
send back to their own world.

This player will be removed
from the multiplayer session.
chn:
能选择亲自召唤的人物，
将对方遣返回原本的世界。

该名人物会离开多人联机游玩。

eng:
Removed from multiplayer session.
Returning to own world.
chn: 离开多人联机游玩，返回原本的世界

eng:
Lures in invaders.

This allows your world to be invaded without any Furled Finger cooperators present, and it also shortens the interval between windows of opportunity for invasion.

Additionally, enables the arrival of a second invader to join when a cooperator is present. (With two invaders, the maximum number of cooperators becomes one.)
chn:
能吸引入侵者前来。

即使没有召唤协助者（勾指）也会受到入侵，
并且缩短玩家入侵的时间间距。

此外，在已召唤协助者的情况下，
会允许第２位入侵者入侵。
（当入侵者共有２位时，协助者的人数最多１位。）

eng: Stop beckoning invaders to your world
chn: 解除吸引入侵者的状态

eng:
Puts you into a ready state to answer, should
someone in another world call for rescue.
You will be summoned to their world as a hunter.

Multiplayer will begin once you are summoned.
(Your objective will be to defeat invaders.)
chn:
收到来自其他世界的召唤请求时，
能回应要求，作为狩猎入侵者的猎人接受召唤。

受召唤到其他世界之后，
将开始猎人多人联机游玩。
（目标是打败入侵者。）

eng:
Allows you to automatically request for a hunter from another world to come to your rescue when your world is invaded.

You can also use this after being invaded to summon a hunter for help.
(Summoning rescuers may not always be possible.)
chn:
被入侵者入侵时，
能自动发出请求，召唤狩猎入侵者的猎人。
也能在被入侵后再使用。

（但在部分场合无法进行召唤。）

eng:
Send a cooperative summon sign to several nearby summoning pools (activated pools only).

If you are summoned, you will be transported to that summoning pool's location in the host player's world and multiplayer will begin.
(Your objective will be to help the host player defeat the area boss.)
chn:
能将协力多人联机游玩的召唤记号
送往附近几个记号聚集处。
（仅限已可使用的记号聚集处。）

受召唤之后，会从记号聚集处
开始协力多人联机游玩。
（目标是打败区域头目。）

eng: Remove co-op summon sign from summoning pool
chn: 抹除送往记号聚集处的协力记号

eng:
Send a competitive summon sign to several nearby summoning pools (activated pools only).

If you are summoned, you will be transported to that summoning pool's location in the host player's world and multiplayer will begin.
(Your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers.)
chn:
能将敌对多人联机游玩的召唤记号
送往附近几个记号聚集处。
（仅限已可使用的记号聚集处。）

受召唤之后，会从记号聚集处
开始敌对多人联机游玩。
（目标是打败“勾指主人”。）

eng: Remove hostile summon sign from summoning pool
chn: 抹除送往记号聚集处的敌对记号

eng:
Attempt to invade another player's world as a Bloody Finger.

If you successfully invade, your Festering Bloody Finger will be spent and invasion multiplayer will begin. (Your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers.)

You can attempt another invasion of the same world by using a Phantom Finger item. (These items are consumed upon use.)
chn:
能作为“血指”入侵其他玩家的世界。

入侵成功后会消耗“溃烂血指”，
并前往其他世界，开始入侵多人联机游玩。
（目标是打败“勾指主人”。）

在入侵多人联机游玩，能消耗指幻影类道具，
再次入侵曾经入侵过的世界。
（指幻影类道具为消耗道具。）

eng:
Attempt to invade another player's world as a recusant.

If you successfully invade, invasion multiplayer will begin. (Your objective will be to defeat the Host of Fingers.)

You can attempt another invasion of the same world by using a Phantom Finger item. (These items are consumed upon use.)
chn:
能作为“叛律者”入侵其他玩家的世界。

入侵成功后，将前往其他世界，
开始入侵多人联机游玩。
（目标是打败“勾指主人”。）

在入侵多人联机游玩，能消耗指幻影类道具，
再次入侵曾经入侵过的世界。
（指幻影类道具为消耗道具。）
